entry.title: Friday: Snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
